kv4.2:4.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā sotāpanno na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:5.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā sakadāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:6.3: Hañci saha upapattiyā anāgāmī na hoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:8.1: Sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
kv4.2:8.3: Hañci sāriputto thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:9.5: mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahāti?
kv4.2:9.7: Hañci mahāpanthako thero na saha upapattiyā arahā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:10.3: Upapattesiyena cittena arahattaṁ sacchikaroti lokiyena sāsavena …pe… saṅkilesiyenāti?
kv4.2:11.3: Upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ niyyānikaṁ khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavaṁ …pe…
kv4.2:12.1: Nanu upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ aniyyānikaṁ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṁ …pe…
kv4.2:12.4: Hañci upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ aniyyānikaṁ na khayagāmi na bodhagāmi na apacayagāmi sāsavaṁ …pe… saṅkilesiyaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.2:13.3: Upapattesiyena cittena rāgaṁ pajahati, dosaṁ pajahati, mohaṁ pajahati, anottappaṁ pajahatīti?
kv4.2:14.3: Upapattesiyaṁ cittaṁ maggo … satipaṭṭhānaṁ …pe… sammappadhānaṁ … iddhipādo … indriyaṁ … balaṁ … bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.2:15.3: Upapattesiyena cittena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
